SD.14 StructureDefinition-medicationstatement-uv-ips

Conformance resource variables defined here

SD.14.1 Formal Views of Profile Content

Description of Profiles, Differentials, and Snapshots.

The official URL for this profile is: http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/StructureDefinition/medicationstatement-uv-ips

Published on Wed Feb 14 14:57:06 MST 2018 as a draft by HL7 International.

This profile builds on MedicationStatement

Summary

Must-Support: 9 elements
Prohibited: 13 elements

Structures

This structure refers to these other structures:

  • unable to summarise profile http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/StructureDefinition/CodeableConcept-uv-ips (no profile found)
  • http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/StructureDefinition/medication-uv-ips

  • ​http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/StructureDefinition/Quantity-uv-ips

Extensions

This structure refers to these extensions:

  • Unable to summarise extension http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/data-absent-reason-uv-ips (no extension found)

Snapshot View

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
MedicationStatement I0..*Record of medication being taken by a patient
dom-2: If the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT contain nested Resources
dom-1: If the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT contain any narrative
dom-4: If a resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT have a meta.versionId or a meta.lastUpdated
dom-3: If the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL be referred to from elsewhere in the resource
mst-1: Reason not taken is only permitted if Taken is No

repeat ΣI0..1ElementWhen the event is to occur
ele-1: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
tim-9: If there's an offset, there must be a when (and not C, CM, CD, CV)
tim-5: period SHALL be a non-negative value
tim-6: If there's a periodMax, there must be a period
tim-7: If there's a durationMax, there must be a duration
tim-8: If there's a countMax, there must be a count
tim-1: if there's a duration, there needs to be duration units
tim-10: If there's a timeOfDay, there cannot be be a when, or vice versa
tim-2: if there's a period, there needs to be period units
tim-4: duration SHALL be a non-negative value

drt-1: There SHALL be a code if there is a value and it SHALL be an expression of time. If system is present, it SHALL be UCUM.

ele-1: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
code ΣI0..1codeSymbol in syntax defined by the system
ele-1: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
display ΣI0..1stringRepresentation defined by the system
ele-1: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
userSelected ΣI0..1booleanIf this coding was chosen directly by the user
ele-1: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
text ΣI0..1stringPlain text representation of the concept
ele-1: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
dose[x] ΣI0..1Range, SimpleQuantityAmount of medication per dose
ele-1: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
rng-2: If present, low SHALL have a lower value than high
